name: Steven2PM's Maze Division
description:
Steven2PM's Maze Division Is A Different/Cooler Version Of Steven2PM's Maze! I Hope It's Better Than The Other Games I've Made.

Story: Oh Noes! Steven Had Enough Because John(You) Keeps Escaping To Not Getting Killed. So Steven Decided To Make Plans More HARDER, He Maked A Big Maze With 3 Floors To Make John A Hard Job To Do It! So Collect All 20 Blue Books In Every Floors To Go In A Secret Room With An Exit To Win! The Final Thing I Say Is:

GOOD LUCK MY FRIEND!
